WorkItem.Description:
I am using WPFToolkit Calendar Control from WPFToolkit library. I am experiencing weird UI behavior. The following set of events happening.
Â 
Open calendar widget
Click on the month at the top of the widget (takes you to the list of months)
Select a different month
Click on the month at the top of the widget (Now it closes the Calendar)
At the 4th Step, it shouldn't closes the Calendar. Any idea why it is happening?
WorkItem.Summary: WPFToolkit Calendar Controls Display Mode Navigation Issue
